name: part_015
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY1】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade hololive stage DAY1【チラ見せ】 [Of2b9eBHFS4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori performs 'I inza HAPPY' on stage.
Stage transition with crowd cheering and light show.
Shirogane Noel performs 'Lyrical Monster' on stage.

subtitles.original: ...ても言えぬ お帰りに
subtitles.english: ...but I can't even say "Welcome home."

subtitles.original: どっと沸き立つ
subtitles.english: A sudden roar of excitement.

subtitles.original: 隠したい 隠したいんじゃ I inza HAPPY
subtitles.english: I want to hide it, I want to hide it, I'm in the HAPPY.

subtitles.original: 会いてぇ 会いてぇ 愛してぇ 死ぬっぺ
subtitles.english: I want to see you, I want to see you, I love you, I'm gonna die!

subtitles.original: ダメな僕を どーんと覚えておいて
subtitles.english: Please remember the useless me forever.

subtitles.original: 目先 キラキラ シット ぼちぼちだ
subtitles.english: Sparkling before my eyes, shit, it's so-so.

subtitles.original: ギブアップなんて言わないんだぜ
subtitles.english: I'm not gonna say "I give up!"

subtitles.original: 本命 メラメラ ぶっちぎる次第で
subtitles.english: Burning with my true love, I'm gonna pull ahead!

subtitles.english: Bursting with hope, it hurts, hurrah!

subtitles.english: Getting all messy with you forever...

subtitles.english: I'm in the HAPPY.

subtitles.english: Feel the expectations even more.

subtitles.english: Is everyone excited?

subtitles.english: Keep pumping up the mood!

subtitles.english: Fantastic, enjoy even more! This is good luck, isn't it?

subtitles.original: もう一回回って 絶好調

subtitles.original: 伸び伸び いつも通り
subtitles.english: Relaxed, as usual.

subtitles.english: I'm going to keep going like this.

subtitles.original: 凛々 凛々 ようやく 100%
subtitles.english: Rin-rin, rin-rin, finally 100%!

subtitles.original: 想像以上の 正体 スルーするから
subtitles.english: Because I'll ignore your true identity, which is beyond imagination.

subtitles.original: バンビー バンビー 来たもん勝ち
subtitles.english: Bambi, Bambi, first come, first served!

subtitles.original: 表情しない 恥も外聞も
subtitles.english: No expression, no shame or concern for reputation.

subtitles.original: 猛毒 なんかではありません
subtitles.english: It's not some kind of deadly poison.

subtitles.original: Guess or Yes 何でもオーライ
subtitles.english: Guess or yes, anything is all right!

subtitles.original: 一緒に進んでいきなさい 目覚めし

subtitles.original: 人と違う時もあるよ
subtitles.english: There are times when you're different from others.

subtitles.original: そこが いいところ
subtitles.english: That's what's good about it.

subtitles.original: どんな日も 笑顔にするから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you smile no matter what day it is.

subtitles.original: どんどん笑って 相乗効果
subtitles.english: Laugh more and more, creating a synergy!

subtitles.original: ニコニコ 100万点
subtitles.english: A smile worth a million points.

subtitles.original: あらららら ラブ & ピース
subtitles.english: A-ra-ra-ra-ra, love and peace.
